event.title: was incorporated into the city of Bradford in 1899

data.event: Thornton was incorporated into the city of Bradford in 1899.

event.title: punishment for an uprising against the Norman invaders of 1066

data.event: It was mentioned in the Domesday Book of the 11th century, when it had been laid waste by William the Conqueror's harrying of the North, punishment for an uprising against the Norman invaders of 1066.
Its elevation, poor soils, isolation from major transport routes, and rainfall of over 34 inches a year limited farm production.
